00060 class CommonServiceValues
00061 {
00062 public:
00069                 enum TransportProtocol{
00070                         UNKNOWN = 0,            
00071                         TCP = Socket::UDP,  
00072                         UDP = Socket::TCP       
00073                 };
00074 
00081                 enum SizeOfBuffers {
00082                         ServiceField = 64,      
00083                         ProtocolAndTransportField = ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp"), 
00084                         ServiceNameLength = (3*ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp") + kDNSServiceMaxDomainName + 4), 
00085                         RegtypeLength = ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp")
00086                 };
00087 
00088                 static SimpleString OmiscidServiceDnsSdType;
00089                 static const SimpleString DefaultDomain;
00090 
00091                 static const SimpleString DefaultServiceClassName;
00092 };
